gameplay.title: Gameplay
gameplay.description: The goal of the game is to move as many casters on the board using their stamina, and loot. Resources you find can be used to level up, and chests will contain items that you can trade to gain more wealth and power.

story.title: Story
story.description: In the land of Avaria where magic reigns supreme, GrandCaster Mejulah, the Oracle of Space and Time, has disappeared! In his absence, adventurers must collect resources to level up and master time.

loot.title: Items
loot.description: Equip your casters with items to increase the number of resources they can collect. Rare items will give you a significant boost and be coveted by others. Grind your way up the leaderboards to Add a Friend.

faq.LCDesc: A realtime mobile strategy and NFT market economy game, built on Solana.
faq.whatsLADA: What is LADA? How do I get it?
faq.LADADesc: LADA will be the native LadderCaster in-game Token. It will be available on the Serum orderbook on launch day. LADA Tokens will initially be sold for $0.01.
faq.whitelist: Is there a Whitelist or Pre-Sale?
faq.whitelistDesc: There are no Whitelists or Pre-Sales. The only way to get LADA Token is to trade it on Serum/Jupiter April 8th at 18:00 UTC.
faq.mintDesc: You will only be able to Mint Casters on April, 8th at 18:OO UTC. Casters will cost 1000 LADA Tokens.
faq.marketplaceDesc: LadderCaster characters and items can be listed on Fractal.is, a gaming NFT marketplace; Holaplex, an open-source marketplace, and Magic Eden, Solana’s largest marketplace. Players are able to list NFT drops for durable in-game assets and sell directly to other players.

error.stakeBalance: Can't stake more than your balance.

content.stakeDesc: Want to put your LADA to work?
content.stakeDesc2: Stake and get back to looting.

referrals.title: Better Together
referrals.description: Adventure is better together. Invite your friends and you will each receive rewards in-game. The release date will be announced at a later date, but you can start getting ready with your friends today!
referrals.email: Enter your email to create account
referrals.conditions: Rewards may vary, and all values are subject to change at any time.
